General.Name: AIMA Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: AIMA Technology Group CO., LTD engages in the research and development, production, and sale of electric bicycles, mopeds, and motorcycles in China and internationally. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

2.Name: Mr. Chunyan  Wang
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
